title: Leonardo DiCaprio
briefBio: Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio is an American actor, film producer, and environmentalist. He alccolades include and Academy Award and three Golden Globe Awards.

title: Julia Roberts
briefBio: Julia Fiona Roberts is an American actress and a producer. she has established herself as a leading lady in Hollywood and has won three Golden Globe awards, from eight nominations and has been nominated for four Academy Awards for her acting.

title: Morgan Freeman
briefBio: Morgan Freeman is an American actor, film director, and film narrator. He has won an Academy Award in 2005 and has recied Oscar nominations and has also  won a Golden Globe award.

title: Angelina Jolie
briefBio: Angelina Jolie is an American actress, filmmaker, and humanitarian. She is a recipient of accolades such as an Academy Award and three Golden Globe Awards. She has been named Hollywood's highest-paid actress multiple times.
